title: The Nilamani Raasi Necklace: A Diamond and Sapphire Statement
materials: Crafted in 18K Yellow Gold. Features a central pear-shaped blue Sapphire of exceptional clarity
surrounded by brilliant-cut Diamonds. The chain is comprised of baguette-cut Diamonds individually set for maximum brilliance.
features: This necklace boasts a modern aesthetic with a classic touch. The Sapphire pendant is accentuated by a halo of sparkling Diamonds, creating a captivating focal point. The geometric design of the baguette Diamond chain adds a contemporary flair.
colors: The primary colors are a vibrant royal blue from the Sapphire and the dazzling white brilliance of the Diamonds
set against the warm glow of yellow gold.
occasions: or any occasion where you desire to make a sophisticated statement. A stunning piece to pair with a Kanchipuram silk saree or a contemporary evening gown.
description: This necklace beautifully blends modern design with timeless elegance. The high-quality Sapphire and Diamonds ensure a luxurious feel, while the classic design promises lasting appeal. It's a versatile piece that can elevate any outfit.
